trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCommand> event is raised when a button in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCommand>中的按鈕時引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>按一下控制項時。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您執行自訂常式，每當發生此事件。

trans-unit.source: Buttons in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control can also invoke built-in functionality of the control.
trans-unit.target: 在按鈕<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制項也可以叫用控制項的內建功能。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists values that you can use with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property of a button in order to invoke built-in functionality.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出您可以搭配使用的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>才能叫用內建功能按鈕的屬性。

trans-unit.source: CommandName value
trans-unit.target: CommandName 值

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: "Cancel"
trans-unit.target: [取消]

trans-unit.source: Cancels an edit or insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 取消編輯或插入作業。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling> 事件。

trans-unit.source: "Delete"
trans-unit.target: "Delete"

trans-unit.source: Deletes the current record from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 將目前的資料錄從資料來源中刪除。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleted> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleting> events.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleted>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleting>事件。

trans-unit.source: "Select"
trans-unit.target: 「 選取 」

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndex%2A> property to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DisplayIndex%2A> property value for the item.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndex%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DisplayIndex%2A>項目的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Renders the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedItemTemplate%2A> template for the item.
trans-unit.target: 呈現<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedItemTemplate%2A>的項目範本。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanging> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanging>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: "Edit"
trans-unit.target: [編輯]

trans-unit.source: Puts the item in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 將項目置於編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: Renders the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate%2A> template for the item.
trans-unit.target: 呈現<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate%2A>的項目範本。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemEditing> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemEditing> 事件。

trans-unit.source: "Insert"
trans-unit.target: "Insert"

trans-unit.source: Inserts the bound values from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A> template into the data source.
trans-unit.target: 插入繫結的值從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>到資料來源的範本。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserting> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted> events.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserting>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted>事件。

trans-unit.source: "Update"
trans-unit.target: 「 更新 」

trans-unit.source: Updates the current record in the data source with the bound values from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate%2A> template.
trans-unit.target: 從繫結值來更新資料來源中目前的記錄<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate%2A>範本。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdating> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated> events.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdating>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated>事件。

trans-unit.source: "Sort"
trans-unit.target: "Sort"

trans-unit.source: Sorts the columns listed in the `CommandArgument` property of the button.
trans-unit.target: 排序列出的資料行`CommandArgument`按鈕的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorting> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorted> events.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorting>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorted>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCommand> event is also raised when a button that is listed in the previous table is clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCommand>上表中所列按鈕時，也會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: However, it is recommended that you use the events listed in the table.
trans-unit.target: 不過，建議您使用列在資料表中的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCommand> event is usually used to handle custom operations.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCommand>事件通常用來處理自訂作業。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCommandEventArgs> object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to determine the command name and command argument of the button that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCommandEventArgs>物件傳遞至事件處理常式，可讓您判斷已按下按鈕的命令引數與命令的名稱。

trans-unit.source: To determine the command name, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷命令名稱，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To determine the command argument, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷此命令引數，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To access the control that raised the event, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取控制項引發事件，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCommand> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCommand>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an item is created in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> 控制項中建立項目時發生。

trans-unit.source: Before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control can be rendered, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem> object must be created for each item in the control.
trans-unit.target: 之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>可以呈現控制項，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem>必須針對每個控制項中的項目建立物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCreated> event is raised when each item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control is created.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCreated>就會引發事件時每個項目中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>建立控制項。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as adding custom content to an item.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您執行自訂常式，每當發生此事件，例如將自訂內容新增到項目。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemEventArgs> object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to access the properties of the item that is being created.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemEventArgs>物件傳遞至事件處理常式，可讓您存取正在建立之項目的屬性。

trans-unit.source: To access a specific control in the item, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem> object that is contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemEventArgs.Item%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取特定的控制項項目中，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem>中所包含的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemEventArgs.Item%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemEventArgs>物件。

trans-unit.source: You can determine which item type (data item, insert item, empty item) is being created by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem.ItemType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以判斷哪一個項目類型 （資料項目，插入項目，空的項目） 由使用所建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem.ItemType%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a data item is bound to data in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 當資料項目繫結至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> 控制項中的資料時發生。

trans-unit.source: Before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control can be rendered, each item in the control must be bound to a record in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>可以呈現控制項，控制項中的每個項目必須繫結至資料來源中的記錄。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDataBound> event is raised when a data item is bound to data in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDataBound>資料項目所繫結中的資料時，就會引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: (Data items are represented by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem> objects.) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as modifying the values of the data that is bound to the item.
trans-unit.target: (資料項目都由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem>物件。)這可讓您執行自訂常式，每當發生此事件，例如修改的資料繫結項目的值。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemEventArgs> object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to access the properties of the item that is being bound.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemEventArgs>物件傳遞至事件處理常式，可讓您存取繫結項目的屬性。

trans-unit.source: To access a specific control in the item, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem> object that is contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemEventArgs.Item%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取特定的控制項項目中，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem>中所包含的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemEventArgs.Item%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemEventArgs>物件。

trans-unit.source: You can determine which item type (data item, insert item, empty item) is being bound by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem.ItemType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以判斷哪一個項目類型 （資料項目，插入項目，空的項目） 所使用繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem.ItemType%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDataBound> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示如何使用 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDataBound> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a delete operation is requested, after the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> control deletes the item.
trans-unit.target: 當要求刪除作業時，在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> 控制項刪除項目之後發生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleted> event is raised when an item's Delete button is clicked or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DeleteItem%2A> method is called, after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control deletes the item.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleted>在按下的項目 [刪除] 按鈕時，會引發事件或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DeleteItem%2A>呼叫的方法，之後<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制刪除的項目。

trans-unit.source: (A Delete button is a button control whose <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property is set to "Delete".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as checking the results of the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: ([刪除] 按鈕就是 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> 屬性設定為 "Delete" 的按鈕控制項)。這可讓您執行自訂常式，每當發生此事件，例如檢查刪除作業的結果。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs> object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to determine the number of rows that were affected in the data source.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs>物件傳遞至事件處理常式，可讓您判斷資料來源中受到影響的資料列數目。

trans-unit.source: It also lets you determine what exceptions might have occurred.
trans-unit.target: 它也可讓您判斷可能發生哪些例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: You can indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指出是否已處理例外狀況的事件處理常式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs>物件`true`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to add an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleted> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何加入事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleted>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a delete operation is requested, but before the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> control deletes the item.
trans-unit.target: 當要求刪除作業時，但是在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> 控制項刪除項目之前發生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleting> event is raised when an item's Delete button is clicked or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DeleteItem%2A> method is called, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control deletes the item.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleting>在按下的項目 [刪除] 按鈕時，會引發事件或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DeleteItem%2A>呼叫的方法，但之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制刪除的項目。

trans-unit.source: (A Delete button is a button control whose <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property is set to "Delete".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as canceling the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: ([刪除] 按鈕就是 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> 屬性設定為 "Delete" 的按鈕控制項)。這可讓您執行自訂常式，每當發生此事件，例如取消刪除作業。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs> object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to determine the index of the current item.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs>物件傳遞至事件處理常式，可讓您判斷目前的項目索引。

trans-unit.source: It also lets you indicate that the delete operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: 它也可讓您指出應該取消刪除作業。

trans-unit.source: To cancel the delete operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消刪除作業，請設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs>物件`true`。

trans-unit.source: You can also work with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs.Values%2A> collections before the values are passed to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs.Values%2A>之前的值會傳遞至資料來源的集合。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to declaratively add an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleting> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何以宣告方式將加入的事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleting>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an edit operation is requested, but before the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> item is put in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 當要求編輯作業時，在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> 項目進入編輯模式之前發生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemEditing> event is raised when an item's Edit button is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> item is put in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemEditing>項目的 [編輯] 按鈕按一下時前,，會引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>項目置於編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: (An Edit button is a button control whose <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property is set to "Edit".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as canceling the edit operation.
trans-unit.target: ([編輯] 按鈕就是 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> 屬性設定為 "Edit" 的按鈕控制項)。這可讓您執行自訂常式，每當發生此事件，例如取消編輯作業。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewEditEventArgs> object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to determine the index of the current item.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewEditEventArgs>物件傳遞至事件處理常式，可讓您判斷目前的項目索引。

trans-unit.source: It also lets you indicate that the edit operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: 它也可讓您指出應該取消編輯作業。

trans-unit.source: To cancel the edit operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewEditEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消的編輯作業，請設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewEditEventArgs>物件`true`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to add an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemEditing> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何加入事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemEditing>事件。

trans-unit.source: This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an insert operation is requested, after the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> control has inserted the item in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 當要求插入作業時，在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> 控制項將項目插入資料來源之後發生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted> event when an Insert button in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A> template is clicked or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertNewItem%2A> method is called, after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control inserts the item in the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted>事件中的 [插入] 按鈕時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>範本已按下或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertNewItem%2A>呼叫的方法，之後<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制項插入資料來源中的項目。

trans-unit.source: (An Insert button is a button control whose <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property is set to "Insert".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as checking the results of an insert operation.
trans-unit.target: (插入按鈕是的按鈕控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>屬性設定為 「 插入 」。)這可讓您執行自訂常式，每當發生此事件，例如檢查插入作業的結果。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs> object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to determine the number of records affected.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs>物件傳遞至事件處理常式，可讓您判斷受影響的記錄數目。

trans-unit.source: It also lets you determine what exceptions might have occurred.
trans-unit.target: 它也可讓您判斷可能發生哪些例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: To determine the number of records that were affected by the insert operation, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷的插入作業所影響的記錄數目，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether any exceptions occurred, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.Exception%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷是否有發生任何例外狀況，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.Exception%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您還可以指出是否已處理例外狀況的事件處理常式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you want to access the values of the inserted record, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.Values%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要存取插入記錄的值，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.Values%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A> property reports that no items were inserted, you can rebind the insert values to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A> template by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.KeepInInsertMode%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>屬性報告的任何項目已插入，插入值，若要重新繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>藉由設定範本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.KeepInInsertMode%2A>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to add an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何加入事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted>事件。

trans-unit.source: This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an insert operation is requested, but before the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> control performs the insert.
trans-unit.target: 當要求插入作業時，但是在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> 控制項執行插入之前發生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserting> event when an Insert button in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A> template is clicked or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertNewItem%2A> method is called, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control inserts the record.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserting>事件中的 [插入] 按鈕時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>範本已按下或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertNewItem%2A>呼叫的方法，但之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制項才會插入記錄。

trans-unit.source: (An Insert button is a button control whose <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property is set to "Insert".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as HTML-encoding the values of a record before it is inserted in the data source.
trans-unit.target: (插入按鈕是的按鈕控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>屬性設定為 「 插入 」。)這可讓您執行自訂常式，每當發生此事件，例如 HTML 編碼方式記錄的值之前將它插入資料來源中。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertEventArgs> object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to determine the value of an optional command argument sent to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertEventArgs>物件傳遞至事件處理常式，可讓您判斷值的選擇性命令引數傳送至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: It also lets you indicate that the insert operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: 它也可讓您指出應該取消插入作業。

trans-unit.source: To cancel the insert operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消的插入作業，請設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: You can read or modify the field values for the new record by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertEventArgs.Values%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以讀取或修改新記錄的欄位值使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertEventArgs.Values%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to add an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserting> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何加入事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserting>事件。

trans-unit.source: This example contains controls that accept user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 此範例包含控制項可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ID for the item placeholder in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> 控制項中項目預留位置的 ID。

trans-unit.source: The ID for the item placeholder in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> 控制項中項目預留位置的 ID。

trans-unit.source: The default is "itemPlaceholder".
trans-unit.target: 預設為 "itemPlaceholder"。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemPlaceholderID%2A> property to specify an ID for the item placeholder.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemPlaceholderID%2A>屬性指定的項目預留位置的 ID。

trans-unit.source: The item placeholder is the control that you add to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.LayoutTemplate%2A> template (if you are not using groups) or to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.GroupTemplate%2A> template (if you are using groups) to represent where the item will be rendered.
trans-unit.target: 項目預留位置是您將加入的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.LayoutTemplate%2A>範本 （如果您未使用群組），或者<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.GroupTemplate%2A>範本 （如果您使用群組），以代表將會轉譯項目。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemPlaceholderID%2A> property to specify an ID for the item placeholder of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemPlaceholderID%2A>屬性來指定識別碼的項目預留位置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The specified ID is <see langword="null" /> or an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 ID 為 <see langword="null" /> 或空字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem" /> objects that represent the data items of the current page of data in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem" /> 物件的集合，這些物件表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> 控制項中目前資料頁的資料項目。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains all the data items of the current page of data in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 物件，內含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> 控制項中目前資料頁面的所有資料項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Items%2A> property is used to store the data items in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Items%2A>屬性用來存放區中的資料項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control automatically populates the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Items%2A> collection by creating one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem> object for each record in the current page of data in the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制項就會自動填入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Items%2A>集合建立一個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem>物件目前的資料來源中的資料頁中的每一筆記錄。

trans-unit.source: It then adds each object to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 然後，它會將每個物件加入集合。

trans-unit.source: This property is usually used to access a specific item in the control or to iterate though the complete collection of items.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性通常用來存取控制項中的特定項目或逐一完成項目的集合。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Items%2A> collection to access the item that is being edited in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Items%2A>存取正在編輯的項目集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemEditing> event.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemEditing>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the custom content for the separator between the items in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> 控制項中項目之間分隔符號的自訂內容。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the custom content for the separator between the items of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 物件，包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> 控制項的項目之間分隔符號的自訂內容。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />，表示這個屬性尚未設定。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemSeparatorTemplate%2A> property to define the contents of the separator between single items of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemSeparatorTemplate%2A>屬性來定義的單一項目之間的分隔符號內容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemSeparatorTemplate%2A> is displayed after every item except the last one.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemSeparatorTemplate%2A>顯示每個項目，除了最後一個之後。

trans-unit.source: To specify the custom template declaratively, add an `ItemSeparatorTemplate` element inside the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要以宣告方式指定的自訂範本，將`ItemSeparatorTemplate`元素內<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can then add the contents of the template to the `ItemSeparatorTemplate` element.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以加入至範本內容`ItemSeparatorTemplate`項目。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create an item separator in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemSeparatorTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何建立在項目分隔符號<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制項使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemSeparatorTemplate%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the custom content for the data item in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> 控制項中資料項目的自訂內容。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the custom content for the data item in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 物件，包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> 控制項中資料項目的自訂內容。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />，表示這個屬性尚未設定。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemTemplate%2A> property to define a custom user interface (UI) to display the data items.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemTemplate%2A>屬性來定義自訂使用者介面 (UI) 顯示資料的項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemTemplate%2A> template is required by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemTemplate%2A>範本所需的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: It usually contains controls to display the field values of a record.
trans-unit.target: 它通常包含控制項以顯示記錄的欄位值。

trans-unit.source: If you want to let users modify the data, you also usually add buttons to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemTemplate%2A> template that let the user select a record, switch to edit mode, or delete a record.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要讓使用者修改的資料，您通常也會加入按鈕，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemTemplate%2A>範本可讓使用者選取的記錄、 切換至編輯模式，或刪除記錄。

trans-unit.source: To specify the custom template declaratively, add an `ItemTemplate` element inside the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要以宣告方式指定的自訂範本，將`ItemTemplate`元素內<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can then add the contents of the template to the `ItemTemplate` element.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以加入至範本內容`ItemTemplate`項目。

trans-unit.source: To display the field values of the data source that is bound to the control, use a data-binding expression.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示資料來源繫結至控制項的欄位值，請使用資料繫結運算式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Data-Binding Expressions Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/14cdd57d-0f82-4667-b503-73e1a96f136a).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[資料繫結運算式概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/14cdd57d-0f82-4667-b503-73e1a96f136a)。

trans-unit.source: To create buttons that perform the built-in select, delete, and edit operations, add a button control to the template.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立執行內建的選取的按鈕，刪除和編輯作業的按鈕控制項加入至範本。

trans-unit.source: Set its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property to one of the values listed in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 設定其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>下表中列出的屬性，以其中一個值。

trans-unit.source: Button type
trans-unit.target: 按鈕類型

trans-unit.source: CommandName value
trans-unit.target: CommandName 值

trans-unit.source: Delete
trans-unit.target: 刪除

trans-unit.source: "Delete"
trans-unit.target: "Delete"

trans-unit.source: Edit
trans-unit.target: Edit

trans-unit.source: "Edit"
trans-unit.target: [編輯]

trans-unit.source: Select
trans-unit.target: 選用版

trans-unit.source: "Select"
trans-unit.target: 「 選取 」

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to define a custom template for a data item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何定義中的資料項目的自訂範本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an update operation is requested, after the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> control updates the item.
trans-unit.target: 當要求更新作業時，在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> 控制項更新項目之後發生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated> event is raised when an item's Update button is clicked or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.UpdateItem%2A> method is called, after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control updates the item.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated>在按下的項目 [更新] 按鈕時，會引發事件或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.UpdateItem%2A>呼叫的方法，之後<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制更新的項目。

trans-unit.source: (An Update button is a button control whose <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property is set to "Update".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as checking the results of the update operation.
trans-unit.target: (的按鈕控制項的更新 按鈕是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>屬性設定為 「 更新 」。)這可讓您執行自訂常式，每當發生此事件，例如檢查更新作業的結果。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewUpdatedEventArgs> object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to determine the number of rows affected.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewUpdatedEventArgs>物件傳遞至事件處理常式，可讓您判斷受影響的資料列數目。

trans-unit.source: It also lets you determine what exceptions might have occurred.
trans-unit.target: 它也可讓您判斷可能發生哪些例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: You can indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewUpdatedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewUpdatedEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指出是否已處理例外狀況的事件處理常式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewUpdatedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewUpdatedEventArgs>物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to add an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何加入事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated>事件。

trans-unit.source: This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an update operation is requested, but before the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> control updates the item.
trans-unit.target: 當要求更新作業時，但是在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> 控制項更新項目之前發生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdating> event is raised when an item's Update button is clicked or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.UpdateItem%2A> method is called, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control updates the item.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdating>在按下的項目 [更新] 按鈕時，會引發事件或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.UpdateItem%2A>呼叫的方法，但之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制更新的項目。

trans-unit.source: (An Update button is a button control whose <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property is set to "Update".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as canceling the update operation.
trans-unit.target: (的按鈕控制項的更新 按鈕是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>屬性設定為 「 更新 」。)這可讓您執行自訂常式，每當發生此事件，例如取消更新作業。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewUpdateEventArgs> object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to determine the index of the current item.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewUpdateEventArgs>物件傳遞至事件處理常式，可讓您判斷目前的項目索引。

trans-unit.source: It also lets you indicate that the update operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: 它也可讓您指出應該取消更新作業。

trans-unit.source: To cancel the update operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewUpdateEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消更新作業，請設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewUpdateEventArgs>物件`true`。

trans-unit.source: You can work with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A> collections before the values are passed to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A>之前的值會傳遞至資料來源的集合。

trans-unit.source: A typical way to use these collections is to HTML-encode the values supplied by the user before they are stored in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 使用這些集合的典型方式是將 HTML 編碼再將它們儲存在資料來源中，使用者所提供的值。

trans-unit.source: This helps prevent script injection attacks.
trans-unit.target: 這有助於防止指令碼資料隱碼攻擊。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to add an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdating> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何加入事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdating>事件。

trans-unit.source: This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.LayoutTemplate" /> template is created in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.LayoutTemplate" /> 控制項中建立 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> 樣板時發生。

trans-unit.source: Before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control can be rendered, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.LayoutTemplate%2A> template must be created to serve as the root container for the control.
trans-unit.target: 之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>可以呈現控制項，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.LayoutTemplate%2A>必須做為根容器控制項建立範本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.LayoutCreated> event is raised when the layout template in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control is created.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.LayoutCreated>就會引發事件時的版面配置範本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>建立控制項。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您執行自訂常式，每當發生此事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the custom content for the root container in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> 控制項中根容器的自訂內容。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the custom content for the root container in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 物件，包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> 控制項中根容器的自訂內容。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />，表示這個屬性尚未設定。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.LayoutTemplate%2A> property to define a custom user interface (UI) for the root container of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.LayoutTemplate%2A>屬性來定義自訂使用者介面 (UI) 的根容器<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: To specify the layout template, add a `LayoutTemplate` element inside the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定的版面配置範本，將`LayoutTemplate`元素內<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can then add the contents of the template to the `LayoutTemplate` element.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以加入至範本內容`LayoutTemplate`項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.LayoutTemplate%2A> content must include a placeholder control such as a table row (`tr`) element for the items that are defined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemTemplate%2A> template or for groups that are defined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.GroupTemplate%2A> template.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.LayoutTemplate%2A>內容必須包含預留位置的控制項，例如資料表資料列 (`tr`) 所定義之項目的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemTemplate%2A>範本所定義的群組或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.GroupTemplate%2A>範本。

trans-unit.source: The placeholder control must have the `runat` attribute set to "server" and the `ID` attribute set to the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemPlaceholderID%2A> or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.GroupPlaceholderID%2A> property, depending on whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control is using groups.
trans-unit.target: 預留位置控制項都必須有`runat`屬性設為 「 伺服器 」 而`ID`屬性值設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemPlaceholderID%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.GroupPlaceholderID%2A>屬性，取決於是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制項使用群組。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.LayoutTemplate%2A> template is not required by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.LayoutTemplate%2A>範本並不需要的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control without a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.LayoutTemplate%2A> and also without a placeholder server control with a known ID.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制，而<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.LayoutTemplate%2A>和也不預留位置伺服器控制項，並提供已知的識別碼。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to define a custom template for the root container in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何定義根容器中的自訂範本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control without defining a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.LayoutTemplate%2A> template in the control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>不定義控制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.LayoutTemplate%2A>控制項中的範本。

trans-unit.source: A server control with a known ID is also not specified.
trans-unit.target: 具有已知識別碼的伺服器控制項也未指定。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the saved control state values for the control.
trans-unit.target: 物件，包含控制項已儲存的控制項狀態值。

trans-unit.source: Loads the state of the properties in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> control that must be persisted, even when the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState" /> property is set to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 載入 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> 控制項中必須保存的屬性狀態，即使 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState" /> 屬性設定為 <see langword="false" /> 也一樣。

trans-unit.source: This method is primarily used by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員用來擴充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the saved view state values for the control.
trans-unit.target: 物件，含有控制項的已儲存檢視狀態值。

trans-unit.source: Loads the previously saved view state of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 載入先前儲存的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> 控制項檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: This method is primarily used by the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法主要供[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]基礎結構，不適合直接從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state.
trans-unit.target: 不過，控制項開發人員可以覆寫這個方法，以指定自訂的伺服器控制項如何還原其檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the maximum number of items to display on a single page of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> 控制項的單一頁面上顯示的項目最大數目。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of items to display on a single page of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> 控制項的單一頁面所顯示的項目最大數目。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> object is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.MaximumRows%2A> property value is controlled by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> object, and it is same as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PageSize%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>物件相關聯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制項，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.MaximumRows%2A>屬性值由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>物件，且會與相同<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PageSize%2A>屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the value is -1.
trans-unit.target: 否則，值為-1。

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的來源。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an event for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> control should be handled.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否應該處理 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> 控制項的事件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the event should be handled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果應該處理事件則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.OnBubbleEvent%2A> method is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control to optionally handle events that are passed up through the control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.OnBubbleEvent%2A>方法由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制項來選擇性地處理在控制項階層架構會傳遞的事件。

trans-unit.source: It determines whether to handle an event by examining the properties of the <xref:System.EventArgs> object that are contained in the `e` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 它會判斷是否要檢查的內容來處理事件<xref:System.EventArgs>中所包含的物件`e`參數。

trans-unit.source: When an event must be handled, the method performs the appropriate action.
trans-unit.target: 當必須處理事件時，此方法會執行適當的動作。

trans-unit.source: Other events are ignored and passed up the control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 會忽略其他事件，並在控制項階層架構中向上傳遞。

trans-unit.source: The return value of this method indicates whether to handle the event or to pass the event up the control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的傳回值會指出是否處理事件，或將事件控制項階層架構中向上傳遞。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control overrides the base implementation of this method to perform the appropriate action when one of the buttons that is recognized by the control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> Control 覆寫此方法以執行適當的動作，當按一下按鈕控制項所能辨識的其中一個基底實作。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the buttons that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control recognizes.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出這些按鈕的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制項辨認。

trans-unit.source: CommandName value
trans-unit.target: CommandName 值

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: "Cancel"
trans-unit.target: [取消]

trans-unit.source: Cancels an edit or insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 取消編輯或插入作業。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling> 事件。

trans-unit.source: "Delete"
trans-unit.target: "Delete"

trans-unit.source: Deletes the current record from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 將目前的資料錄從資料來源中刪除。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleted> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleting> events.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleted>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleting>事件。

trans-unit.source: "Select"
trans-unit.target: 「 選取 」

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndex%2A> property to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DisplayIndex%2A> property value for the item.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndex%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DisplayIndex%2A>項目的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Renders the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedItemTemplate%2A> template for the item.
trans-unit.target: 呈現<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedItemTemplate%2A>的項目範本。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanging> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanging>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: "Edit"
trans-unit.target: [編輯]

trans-unit.source: Puts the item in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 將項目置於編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: Renders the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate%2A> template for the item.
trans-unit.target: 呈現<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate%2A>的項目範本。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemEditing> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemEditing> 事件。

trans-unit.source: "Insert"
trans-unit.target: "Insert"

trans-unit.source: Inserts the bound values from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A> template into the data source.
trans-unit.target: 插入繫結的值從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>到資料來源的範本。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserting> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted> events.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserting>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted>事件。

trans-unit.source: "Update"
trans-unit.target: 「 更新 」

trans-unit.source: Updates the current record in the data source with the bound values from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate%2A> template.
trans-unit.target: 從繫結值來更新資料來源中目前的記錄<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate%2A>範本。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdating> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated> events.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdating>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated>事件。

trans-unit.source: "Sort"
trans-unit.target: "Sort"

trans-unit.source: Sorts the columns listed in the `CommandArgument` property of the button.
trans-unit.target: 排序列出的資料行`CommandArgument`按鈕的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorting> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorted> events.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorting>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorted>事件。

trans-unit.source: This version of the method returns `true` if one of these buttons raises an event that is handled by the control.
trans-unit.target: 這個版本的方法會傳回`true`如果其中一個這些按鈕會引發的事件由控制項處理。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event bubbling, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件反昇的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Init" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Init" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: When notified by this method, Web server controls must perform any initialization steps that are required to create and set up an instance.
trans-unit.target: 當通知由這個方法時，Web 伺服器控制項都必須執行建立及設定執行個體所需的任何初始化步驟。

trans-unit.source: In this stage of the server control's life cycle, the control's view state has not yet been populated.
trans-unit.target: 在此階段的伺服器控制項的生命週期中，控制項的檢視狀態有尚未填入。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, you cannot access other server controls when this method is called, regardless of whether it is a child or parent of this control.
trans-unit.target: 此外，您無法存取其他伺服器控制項，這個方法呼叫時，無論它是子系或控制項的父系。

trans-unit.source: Other server controls are not guaranteed to be created and ready for access.
trans-unit.target: 不保證會建立並準備好存取其他伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.OnInit%2A> method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.OnInit%2A>方法也可讓衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: When you override <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您覆寫<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" />衍生類別中呼叫基底類別的<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" />方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling> event when a Cancel button in the control is clicked, but before exiting insert or edit mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling>按一下事件，當控制項中的 [取消] 按鈕時，但結束前，插入或編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: (A Cancel button is a button control whose <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property is set to "Cancel".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as stopping the cancel operation if it would put the item in an unwanted state.
trans-unit.target: (取消按鈕定義不的按鈕控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>屬性設定為"Cancel"。)這可讓您執行自訂常式，每當發生此事件，例如停止取消作業，如果項目置於不良的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.OnItemCanceling%2A> method is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.OnItemCanceling%2A>方法透過呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制項引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling>事件。

trans-unit.source: It is typically used by control developers when extending the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> class.
trans-unit.target: 擴充時，它通常會由控制項開發人員用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>類別。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: There is no handler for the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 沒有 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling" /> 事件的處理常式。

trans-unit.target: 當您覆寫<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.OnItemCanceling(System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCancelEventArgs)" />衍生類別中呼叫基底類別的<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.OnItemCanceling(System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCancelEventArgs)" />方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCommand" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCommand" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCommand> event is raised when a button in an item template is clicked, but before the command is executed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCommand>按一下項目範本中的按鈕時，但在執行命令之前，就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to perform a custom routine in response to the supplied <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A> value whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您執行以回應所提供的自訂常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A>值時就會發生此事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.OnItemCommand%2A> method is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCommand> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.OnItemCommand%2A>方法透過呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制項引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCommand>事件。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCreated" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCreated" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control can be rendered, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem> object must be created for each item in the control.
trans-unit.target: 之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>可以呈現控制項，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem>必須針對每個控制項中的項目建立物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCreated> event is raised when each item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control is created.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCreated>就會引發事件時每個項目中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>建立控制項。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as adding content to an item.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您執行自訂常式，每當發生此事件，例如將內容加入至項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.OnItemCreated%2A> method is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.OnItemCreated%2A>方法透過呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制項引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCreated>事件。

trans-unit.source: It is typically used by control developers when extending the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> class.
trans-unit.target: 擴充時，它通常會由控制項開發人員用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>類別。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.target: 當您覆寫<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.OnItemCreated(System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemEventArgs)" />衍生類別中呼叫基底類別的<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.OnItemCreated(System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemEventArgs)" />方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDataBound" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDataBound" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control can be rendered, each item in the control must be bound to a record in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>可以呈現控制項，控制項中的每個項目必須繫結至資料來源中的記錄。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDataBound> event is raised when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem> object is bound to a data item.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDataBound>就會引發事件時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem>物件繫結至資料的項目。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as modifying the values of the data item during the binding process.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您執行自訂常式，每當發生此事件，例如繫結程序期間修改之資料項目的值。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.OnItemDataBound%2A> method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.OnItemDataBound%2A>方法也可讓衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: When you override <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.OnItemDataBound(System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, you must to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.OnItemDataBound(System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您覆寫<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.OnItemDataBound(System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemEventArgs)" />在衍生類別中，您必須呼叫基底類別的<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.OnItemDataBound(System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemEventArgs)" />方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleted" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleted" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleted> event is raised when an item's Delete button is clicked or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DeleteItem%2A> method is called, after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control deletes the item.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleted>在按下的項目 [刪除] 按鈕時，會引發事件或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DeleteItem%2A>呼叫的方法，之後<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制刪除的項目。

trans-unit.source: (A Delete button is a button control whose <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property is set to "Delete".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as checking the results of the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: ([刪除] 按鈕就是 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> 屬性設定為 "Delete" 的按鈕控制項)。這可讓您執行自訂常式，每當發生此事件，例如檢查刪除作業的結果。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleting" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleting" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleting> event is raised when an item's Delete button is clicked or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DeleteItem%2A> method is called, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control deletes the item.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleting>在按下的項目 [刪除] 按鈕時，會引發事件或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DeleteItem%2A>呼叫的方法，但之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制刪除的項目。

trans-unit.source: (A Delete button is a button control whose <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property is set to "Delete".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as canceling the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: ([刪除] 按鈕就是 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> 屬性設定為 "Delete" 的按鈕控制項)。這可讓您執行自訂常式，每當發生此事件，例如取消刪除作業。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.OnItemDeleting%2A> method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.OnItemDeleting%2A>方法也可讓衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> control is not bound to a data source control by using the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID" /> 屬性並不會將 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> 控制項繫結至資料來源控制項。

trans-unit.source: When you override <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.OnItemDeleting(System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.OnItemDeleting(System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您覆寫<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.OnItemDeleting(System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs)" />衍生類別中呼叫基底類別的<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.OnItemDeleting(System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs)" />方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemEditing> event is raised when an item's Edit button is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control enters edit mode.

trans-unit.source: (An Edit button is a button control whose <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property is set to "Edit".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as canceling the edit operation.
trans-unit.target: ([編輯] 按鈕就是 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> 屬性設定為 "Edit" 的按鈕控制項)。這可讓您執行自訂常式，每當發生此事件，例如取消編輯作業。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted> event is raised when an item's Insert button is clicked or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertNewItem%2A> method is called, after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control inserts the item.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted>按一下的項目插入按鈕時，會引發事件或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertNewItem%2A>呼叫的方法，之後<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制插入的項目。

trans-unit.source: (An Insert button is a button control whose <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property is set to "Insert".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as retrieving auto-generated values from the database for the inserted item.
trans-unit.target: (插入按鈕是的按鈕控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>屬性設定為 「 插入 」。)這可讓您執行自訂常式，每當發生此事件，例如針對插入的項目，從資料庫擷取自動產生的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.OnItemInserted%2A> method is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.OnItemInserted%2A>方法透過呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制項引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted>事件。

trans-unit.source: It is typically used by control developers when extending the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> class.
trans-unit.target: 擴充時，它通常會由控制項開發人員用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>類別。
